title: Morning Joe 3/15/21
description: The U.S. hit a daily record over the weekend for coronavirus vaccinations, but what will it take for more of the country to get vaccinated? Dr. Anthony Fauci suggests in a new interview Trump should encourage his supporters to do so. The panel discusses.
author: news.podcasts@nbcuni.com (NBC News)
